Different Crime.Crime Name: Failure to meet residency obligations under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
residency_requirements: Section 28 of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
730 days in Canada over five years
evidence_assessment: contradictory evidence about his business and family situation
